Infrared LEDs PWM

void init_irled_pwm (void)

Detailed Description

Routines for controlling the PWM-Signal of the Infrared-LED. 

 #include <irled_pwm.h>

This code initializes the PWM for the Infrared-LEDs of the light-barrier

Note:
Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
Author:
Rainer Ostendorf
